title: Warning alerts v3: Generate recommended interventions from ranked risk drivers

sections.text: Implement the recommendation layer that consumes the v3 risk score output plus the ranked driver list and returns 3–5 suggested interventions (with rationale, priority, and any required CRM fields/links). Recommendations should be deterministic and rule-based for v1 (e.g., “schedule next meeting” when next-step missing, “reconfirm close plan” when close date slips, “re-engage champion” when activity decays). Add unit tests for driver-to-intervention mapping, handling of missing driver evidence, and a stable response schema for downstream UI rendering.
